ConnectionAddInstruction: You can add new connections with their Zen username

NewConnectionResponses.ERROR_MISSING_PING_ARG: Username is required to add a new connection.
NewConnectionResponses.USER_NOT_FOUND: Sorry we cannot send a ping with this username.
NewConnectionResponses.PING_ALREADY_SENT: You have already sent a ping to this user. Please wait
NewConnectionResponses.CANNOT_CONNECT_TO_YOURSELF: You cannot add yourself as a connection.
NewConnectionResponses.PING_ALREADY_RECEIVED: You already have a connection request waiting. Open your requests to accept or decline.
NewConnectionResponses.ALREADY_CONNECTED: You are already connected with this person
NewConnectionResponses.UNAUTHORIZED: You must be logged in to perform this action.
NewConnectionResponses.MAX_CONNECTIONS_REACHED: You have reached the maximum number of connections (200).

CONNECTION_ALREADY_EXISTS: You're already connected with this user.
